GSD.product_version: versions from v3.8 to before v4.4.294
GSD.description:
ARM: socfpga: Fix crash with CONFIG_FORTIRY_SOURCE

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.4.294 by commit e11b0f401c5b768bc337bd7c226f9e83d5c64394, it was introduced in version v3.8 by commit 9c4566a117a6fe404a0e49b27ac71b631945a70f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ARM: socfpga: Fix crash with CONFIG_FORTIRY_SOURCE
